paragraph:
National ReviewExcellent site for DIY intelligent women’s costumes.Home invasion, Canadian style: RCMP reminds Nova Scotians to lock their doors after pair enter stranger’s home, clean it.  Kind of related: a self-cleaning house.The Lighthouse That Wrecked More Ships Than it Saved.This Chart Explains the Chemicals That Give Autumn Leaves Their Different Colors.The devastating 1889 Johnstown flood killed over 2,000 people in minutes.Lessons from the Sioux in How to Turn a Boy Into a Man.ICYMI, Friday’s links are here, and include Trafalgar Day, Oktoberfest history, an 1880s-era costume guide, how birds avoid crashing into each other in mid-air, and the history of Uranus jokes.NR's afternoon roundup of the day's best commentary & must-read analysis.
